product_desc:
DoMyTatttoo is an online marketplace that allows tattoo artists to expand their client base while building their reputation, and allows tattoo-enthusiasts to book appointments on-demand with trusted artists.

How does DoMyTattoo work?

For tattoo artists: To get started, a tattoo artist can make a profile for free on the DoMyTattoo app. The profile will include a sample portfolio of past work, links to other social media and also the tattoo artists schedule for the day. Long term, integration with existing schedulers would be implemented. In addition, the artist would be prompted for their payments info as well, to enable direct booking through the site. 

For tattoo enthusiasts: By downloading the app, enthusiasts can search tattoo artists by availability, geography and rating and book an artist instantly. Like other successful vertical marketplaces, users would not be prompted for their payments information until after they’ve selected the appointment they want to book.
name: DoMyTattoo
